titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to add Morro Bay, California, to the priority list of the national estuary program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Commerce, Interior, EPA.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to include Morro Bay, California, in the list of areas to be given priority consideration for inclusion in the national estuary program.
